casebody.data:
Nathaniel R. WEBB
v.
NORTH CAROLINA STATE HIGHWAY PATROL, et al. No. 105P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 17, 2018 Mr. Nathaniel R. Webb, For Webb, Nathaniel R. Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For N.C. State Highway Patrol, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 5th of April 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, N.C. Industrial Commission County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of April 2018."
